amendment.description: To require a report on the feasibility of establishing a United States military regional combatant command for Africa.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4527 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4527 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6383) To require a report on the feasibility of establishing a United States military regional combatant command for Africa.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4527 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4527 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Feingold.
